communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

- All purchasing and procurement records related to Veritone and/or its aiWARE technology.
- All policy documents related to the use of Veritone and/or its aiWARE technology, including any privacy assessments
- All marketing and training materials related to the use of Veritone and/or aiWARE technology
- All contracts, MOUs and other agreements related to the use of Veritone and/or aiWARE technology
-All communications, including email, text messages, and minutes of meetings held between your agency and Veritone representatives 

 I am a member of the news media. and the requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Eileen Guo
